node.name: Robot_Dispatch_Backend
node.description: DroneDash is a full-stack web platform built using React, AntDesign, and Spring Boot. The platform offers a comprehensive solution to the drone industry by providing businesses and individual customers in the San Francisco area with an automated self-dispatch solution for their drone needs.
